name: .UNITY3D
summary: Learn about .UNITY3D files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: If you still have access to Unity Web Player and a web browser that supports NPAPI plug-ins, you can use Unity Web Player to open your UNITY3D file. (You may have to right-click the file, select Open with..., and choose your web browser.) If you do not have access to Unity Web Player and a web browser that supports NPAPI plug-ins, you will not be able to open your UNITY3D file.
